description:
The 911 Detox plan is a great way to use natural foods as a medication to clean internal body systems while you simultaneously retool your eating habits.

 911 Detox is not a fasting or a diet plan for weight loss. However when you follow 911 Detox you will experience incredible weight loss and get on the path for lifetime of healthy weight management.

 By adding the right daily nutrients, after cleansing your internal body systems you will see lasting results that will help you achieve better health for the long haul. 


Benefits of 911 Detox for Optimal Living 

Health Benefits:

·      Increased energy levels

·      A boost to your immune system

·      Decreased sinus allergies

·      Clear vision

Weight Benefits:

·      Improved digestion

·      Less feelings of bloating and/or gassiness.

·      Weight loss - up to 15pounds in 21 days without exercise.

·      Reduction of unwanted belly fat.

 Beauty Benefits:

·      Clear and Glowing skin

·      Strong nails

·      Elimination of hair loss.

·      Shiny and silky hair.

 Mood Benefits:

Your body will flush out many negative emotions, such as:

·      Depression or manic depression

·      Feelings of overwhelm and over-sensitivity

·      Crying or becoming easily angered

·      Poor judgment

·      Difficultly making decisions

·      Nervousness and/or restlessness

·      An inability to keep commitments

·      Victim mentality

·      Impatience

·      Lack of motivation or being stuck in a rut

·      Addictions and emotional attachments

·      Being irritable, agitated or emotionally unstable

A healthy liver will provide you with great energy, and when you have plenty of energy you will feel more positive about things and get less stressed.
title: 911 Detox for Optimal Living
